title: Smiles For You
lyrics:
Oh you are to me
Like a remedy
You're my melody
When you walk with me
You're my best friend
You're my best friend

In this world



When I call your name

And I see your face

Yeah you save the day

All the clouds erase

You come and sit next to me, to me



Yeah you are my number one girl



And when I look in your eyes

I know what's on your mind

You don't have to say a thing

You don't have to say a thing



Girl it's here in my heart

I can feel we got something

When I'm feeling low

You come running to

And this smiles for you



Every second of the day

I'm thinking of you baby

You're more than a friend

You're my lady too

And this smiles for you

(This smiles for you)



Always listening

To my every word

Feel so comforting

To know that you heard

I'm so happy

We can always be ourselves

Around each other



And when I look in your eyes

I know what's on your mind

You don't have to say a thing

You don't have to say a thing



Girl it's here in my heart

I can feel we got something

When I'm feeling low

You come running to

And this smiles for you



Every second of the day

I'm thinking of you baby

You're more than a friend

You're my lady too

And this smiles for you

(This smiles for you)



And when I look in your eyes

I know what's on your mind

You don't have to say a thing

You don't have to say a thing



Girl it's here in my heart

I can feel we got something

When I'm feeling low

You come running to

And this smiles for you



Every second of the day

I'm thinking of you baby

You're more than a friend

You're my lady too

And this smiles for you

(This smiles for you)

This smiles for you

This smiles for you
